name: Juggling Frenzy
description:
Here is my submission for the GameDev.tv game jam.

It's a hypercasual game where you only need to left/right click and move to the sides with AD or left/right arrows.

On full screen the game might be easier as the balls are much bigger...

Let me know of any feedback that you may have and have fun!!

PS: Don't forget to post a screenshot of your highscore on the comments.
